hadiths.text: Narrated Al-Miqdam ibn Ma'dikarib al-Kindi: The ablution water was brought to the Messenger (ﷺ) and he performed ablution; he washed his hands up to wrists three times, then washed his forearms three times. He then rinsed his mouth and snuffed up water three times; then he wiped his head and ears inside and outside

chapter.ara-name: باب صِفَةِ وُضُوءِ النَّبِيِّ صلى الله عليه وسلم
chapter.eng-name: The Manner of The Prophet's Wudu'
